titleStmt.title: A list of the names of all the adventurers in the stock of the governour and company of merchants of London, trading into the East-Indies, the 4th of April, 1700. Whereof those marked with a are capable (by their adventure) to be chosen governour or Deputy-Governour, and those with a * to be of the committee
Lists. 1700
titleStmt.author: East India Company.
